EmailTemplate.name: Graduate Coordinator Reminder for Overdue Milestones
EmailTemplate.subject: Overdue Milestone: {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
I am writing to you concerning the overdue milestone for this student.
Our records indicate that this student’s confirmation/mid candidature review/pre-submission seminar was due on XXX.
Under the Graduate Research Progress Management Policy and Procedure research students must satisfactorily achieve the requirements of the milestone in order to remain enrolled. A failure to meet the requirements of a milestone means that the student is deemed to be making unsatisfactory progress. All milestones are defined as hurdle requirements.
Could you please advise me of what arrangements have been made for this milestone to be finalised.
Can you please response by PROVIDE 5 WORKING DAYS.
Please contact MGE on 03 9905 3050 or mge-rcandidature@monash.edu for enquiries and more information.
If we can be of any further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact the MGE Candidature team on 9905 3050.
Kind regards,
XNAMEX
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DELETE WHEN SENDING - Instructions for sending email
Distribution to:
TO: Graduate coordinator
COPY TO: ADRT (FUA student)
Supervisor
Local administrator
Faculty contact
Action required:
1. Send this email where a student is appearing on two consecutive overdue reports.
2. Before you proceed - check milestone comments to ensure that a new date has not been scheduled.
3. If a new date has been set – send this email 2 weeks are the revised due date.
4. Annotate Milestone comments in Callista once email is sent and feedback is received.
5. Follow up after 5 working days.
6. TRIM email
7. Escalate to Candidature Manager if no response received
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
